message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects the product's quality and potential. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for this product. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $10000 is my minimum, I'm willing to compromise slightly. How about we meet in the middle at $12500?  This would still give you a good deal, and allow me to recoup some of my investment. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I must stick to my budget. I am still only able to consider offers up to $10000. Would it be possible to reach a mutual agreement within this price range?
